channel.title: Quickstarts on EngineBlock
channel.description: Recent content in Quickstarts on EngineBlock

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Getting EngineBlock The latest release can always be run with this simple script: run-eb. You can use the commands below to get it. curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/engineblock/engineblock/master/eb-cli/bin/run-eb chmod u+x run-eb ./run-eb help This script demonstrates how to fetch the version of the latest published artifact via maven central search. It also downloads that artifact if it doesn’t find it locally cached within the last 2 days. A cautionary word: As always, blindly running scripts from the web is not a good idea.
